00020 #ifndef PACKET_H_
00021 #define PACKET_H_
00022 
00023 #include <com/xuggle/ferry/RefPointer.h>
00024 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/IPacket.h>
00025 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/FfmpegIncludes.h>
00026 #include <com/xuggle/ferry/IBuffer.h>
00027 
00028 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace xuggler
00029 {
00030   class Packet : public IPacket
00031   {
00032   public:
00033     /* The default make() method doesn't add a payload */
00034     VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT(Packet);
00035   public:
00036     /* This make allocates a default payload of size payloadSize */
00037     static Packet* make(int32_t payloadSize);
00038     /* This make a packet that just wraps a given IBuffer */
00039     static Packet* make(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* buffer);
00040     /* This makes a packet wrapping the buffer in another packet and copying
00041      * it's settings
00042      */
00043     static Packet* make(Packet* packet, bool);
00044   public:
00045     // IMediaData
00046     virtual int64_t getTimeStamp() { return getDts(); }
00047     virtual void setTimeStamp(int64_t aTimeStamp) { setDts(aTimeStamp); }
00048     virtual bool isKey() { return isKeyPacket(); }
00049     virtual IRational* getTimeBase() { return mTimeBase.get(); }
00050     virtual void setTimeBase(IRational *aBase) { mTimeBase.reset(aBase, true); }
00051     
00052     // IPacket
00053     virtual void reset();
00054 
00055     virtual int64_t getPts();
00056     virtual int64_t getDts();
00057     virtual int32_t getSize();
00058     virtual int32_t getMaxSize();
00059 
00060     virtual int32_t getStreamIndex();
00061     virtual int32_t getFlags();
00062     virtual bool isKeyPacket();
00063     virtual int64_t getDuration();
00064     virtual int64_t getPosition();
00065     virtual com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* getData();
00066     virtual int32_t allocateNewPayload(int32_t payloadSize);
00067     virtual bool isComplete();
00068     
00069     virtual void setKeyPacket(bool keyPacket);
00070     virtual void setFlags(int32_t flags);
00071     virtual void setPts(int64_t pts);
00072     virtual void setDts(int64_t dts);
00073     virtual void setComplete(bool complete, int32_t size);
00074     virtual void setStreamIndex(int32_t streamIndex);
00075     virtual void setDuration(int64_t duration);
00076     virtual void setPosition(int64_t position);
00077     virtual int64_t getConvergenceDuration();
00078     virtual void setConvergenceDuration(int64_t duration);
00079     virtual void setData(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* buffer);
00080 
00081     AVPacket *getAVPacket() { return mPacket; }
00082     /*
00083      * Unfortunately people can do a getAVPacket() and have
00084      * FFMPEG update the buffers without us knowing.  When
00085      * that happens, we need them to tell us so we can update
00086      * our own buffer state.
00087      */
00088     void wrapAVPacket(AVPacket* pkt);
00089     void wrapBuffer(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer *buffer);
00090     // Used by the IBuffer to free buffers.
00091     static void freeAVBuffer(void *buf, void *closure);
00092 
00093   protected:
00094     Packet();
00095     virtual ~Packet();
00096   private:
00097     AVPacket* mPacket;
00098     com::xuggle::ferry::RefPointer<com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer> mBuffer;
00099     com::xuggle::ferry::RefPointer<IRational> mTimeBase;
00100     bool mIsComplete;
00101   };
00102 
00103 }}}
00104 
00105 #endif /*PACKET_H_*/
